name: Au P’tit Monde
description: Au P’tit Monde de San Francisco is a French immersion preschool for children 2-5 years old. The lessons in the “Petite Ecole” and “Grande Ecole” take place entirely in French. APM PROGRAM AT A GLANCE: - Our school day runs from 8:00am to 5:30pm. - Our school operates on a 12-month calendar year, running from September to August. - Parents may opt to enroll their child in the 2, 3, or 5-day program. - The school provides homemade, organic and wholesome meals. - No prior French language is require
